de.parsemis.utils
Class HalfIntMatrix

java.lang.Object
  de.parsemis.utils.HalfIntMatrix
All Implemented Interfaces:
IntMatrix
public class HalfIntMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements IntMatrix

This class represents a lower (or upper) triangle matrix that stores ints.

Author:
Thorsten Meinl (Thorsten.Meinl@informatik.uni-erlangen.de), Marc Woerlein (woerlein@informatik.uni-erlangen.de)
